SignInRequest.description: Request interface for user sign-in operations

signinMethod.description: The authentication method to use (EMAIL, SOCIAL, or PASSKEY)

userEmail.description: User's email address (required for EMAIL signin method)

targetPublicKey.description: Target public key for authentication (required for EMAIL and SOCIAL signin methods)

provider.description: OAuth provider name (required for SOCIAL signin method)

oidcToken.description: OIDC token from OAuth provider (required for SOCIAL signin method)

challenge.description: Challenge string for passkey authentication (required for PASSKEY signin method)

attestation.description: Attestation object for passkey authentication (required for PASSKEY signin method)

magicLink.description: Optional magic link template URL for email authentication

post.description:
Uploads the dydx address to the turnkey table.

Backend won't have this information when we create account for user since you need signature
to derive dydx address. Just wait for fe to uplaod to kick off the policy setup.

Handles Apple login redirect from Apple's authorization server
Exchanges authorization code for ID token and processes user login/signup
